content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price, but I would like to clarify that I am looking for the highest possible price for the apartment. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 650 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?

Hello Hassan, thanks for coming to see the apartment. I am glad you are interested in the apartment. I will need to discuss the rental price with you. My initial offer is 750 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, I appreciate your offer of 650 Euros per month. However, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. I would be willing to discuss the possibility of increasing the rental price to 750 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.

Hello Hassan, great to hear that you are willing to agree to the rental price of 750 Euros per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, I am glad that we were able to agree on the rental price of 750 Euros per month. Before we finalize the rental agreement, I would like to clarify that this price does not include any additional costs such as utilities or other fees. I would be happy to discuss any additional costs with you if you are interested. Additionally, I would like to make sure that you understand the terms and conditions of the rental agreement before we sign it. Would you be willing to review the terms and conditions and let me know if you have any questions or concerns?
name: Heinrich Heine
